channel.title: Who made the first private server? and how did he/she make it
channel.description:
[u]- [b]Who made the first Runescape private server?[/b][/u] [u]- [b]How did he/she make it ?(Like, Decompiled an orginal server, or sniff packets(That would be allot of work) [/b][/u]
[Same about the first Private server client.]
I've heard someone say the first server was made in C++.
Ive been woundering about this for very long now.

item.title: Who made the first private server? and how did he/she make it
item.dc:creator: @Clawz_fury lare69
item.description:
@Clawz_fury wrote:

[quote=“Newty, post:16, topic:380448”]Yeah everyone disregard that I posted it earlier. Continue on with your completely irrelevant talk that in no way helps the thread!

[quote author=Newty link=topic=476278.msg3484656#msg3484656 date=1296443134]

i gotta get a hold of winterlove’s source then

http://www.moparisthebest.com/origrs2/

THE FIRST PRIVATE SERVER!

It really is.
[/quote][/quote]

Don’t feel bad Newty, I listened :o

Read full topic

item.title: Who made the first private server? and how did he/she make it
item.dc:creator: @The_Exclusive The Exclusive
item.description:
@The_Exclusive wrote:

[quote=“rip4d, post:10, topic:380448”]WinterLove was the first, and everything was developed off of that iirc.[quote author=wurz1l link=topic=476278.msg3483632#msg3483632 date=1296364982]
it’s shit
[/quote]No its not, its bare, making it hard for people to leech. It actually took some work to make a successful wL-based server.[/quote]ooohk kk might have a go but right now I looked at the RSC section and im trying to code one up but I dont even know what ant is, it’s not recgonized and Im looking for something called ant but theres nothing

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @rip4d rip4d
item.description:
@rip4d wrote:

WinterLove was the first, and everything was developed off of that iirc.[quote=“wurz1l, post:7, topic:380448”]it’s shit[/quote]No its not, its bare, making it hard for people to leech. It actually took some work to make a successful wL-based server.

If some1 else made the client then it wouldn’t be a RSPS lol
